message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has the potential to bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1400000. This is a competitive price considering the product's worth to you is $1500000. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1350000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1350000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $1380000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you and my initial offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think $1350000 is a fair price for the product. I'm not willing to go any higher than that.

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1350000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering the product to you for $1365000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $1365000. I'm willing to meet you at $1350000, which is the price I initially offered. I hope we can agree on this price.

I'm surprised you're sticking to your initial offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my initial offer. I'm offering the product to you for $1395000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?

I understand you're trying to get closer to your initial offer, but I'm still not willing to pay $1395000. I'm willing to meet you at $1350000, which is the price I think is fair. I hope we can agree on this price.
